item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Plywood is wonderful. You can trust with almost certainty it’s flat and square which allows you to jumpstart your adventures. Baltic birch is your friend. There are gobs of YouTubers making cool things with plywood. I could not stop watching Chris Salomone build all kinds of furniture, have no idea how I found him but he does a great job filming and talking through the process. Cristiana at Get Hands Dirty has some great builds that are almost meditative to sit through.

item.title: Hello
item.description: NEVADA CITY — My name is Nathan and nothing brings me more joy than making something useful. Writing code and pushing around pixels on a screen in an attempt to make something of value for others was my story for the past two decades. This continues to be my day job but I’ve recently decided I need a new challenge to occupy my free time. When I was younger I couldn’t wait to race home and work on side-projects, all involving a screen and a keyboard.
